About_me: I have over 26 years of Instrumentation experience, with 15 years in an EPC role and over 10 years with Shell.I have worked on projects for Upstream, Downstream (Refinery, Chemical, Bitumen, Terminal & Storage), Carbon Capture & Sequestration, Coal Fired Power plants, Steel and Manufacturing plants located in Asia, Middle East, and the Americas. For most of the facilities mentioned, I have worked on the Engineering/Detail design, worked on site as the Construction PACO Engineering focal point, and provided Engineering support during commissioning and start-up.  I enjoy travelling and dining with my family. I also enjoy reading, browsing thru my digital music collection, & compiling / editing family travel digital photos.
